message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 90% to me, 10% to you. Accept and we can move on.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. This way, we both get a fair share.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Bob. 70% to me, 30% to you. This way, I can get a bit more, but we can still move forward.
Alice, let's be reasonable.  I'm willing to give you 40% to ensure we can both agree. This is a fair compromise given the inflation affecting your side.
